E-Mail Messages
Date: Tuesday, 6/17/1990
Subject: Contract extension
Hello,
I just wanted to let you know that I'm
in my last year of the contract.
Are you interested in giving me an extension?
I'd be happy to play for you again next year!

Regards,
Atlee Hammaker



Date: Tuesday, 6/17/1990
Subject: Progress of Mark T. McLemore
Dear Sir,
Mark T. McLemore is hitting the ball well at AA Canton-Akron Indians!
He has an AVG of .442, so you might want
to promote him soon!

Regards,
Scouting Director

I believe he is ready for the next level!

Regards,
Scouting Director

Date: Saturday, 6/28/1990
Subject: Contract extension question
Dear Sir,
My contract expires after this season.
I would like to resign, so please let's talk!

Regards,
Steve Henderson



Date: Sunday, 6/29/1990
Subject: Status of Dave Martinez
Dear Sir,
Dave Martinez shouldn't play at AA Canton-Akron Indians!
He has an AVG of .249 over there, that might
be a sign that he has been promoted to soon. You
should demote him before he gets burned.

Regards,
Scouting Director
